summary: Both previously identified blocking issues were addressed without introducing new blocking problems.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: requireCommunityMatch ran before validation so invalid UUIDs could trigger DB errors and return 500
previous_issues_status.notes: UUID format is now validated in requireCommunityMatch before any DB access, returning 400 on invalid input.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: from_sequence parsed as Number causing precision loss for bigint sequences
previous_issues_status.notes: from_sequence is now treated as a string of digits and passed as string to SQL/JSON, avoiding precision loss.
